bookText.htmlContent: Spitbugs are commonly found in dark and dirty enviroments, where they live in hives with each other and consume sexual secretion.

Where originate from (Merra) they are considered one of the biggest threats outside of cities especially if one is not prepared for the encounter.

Their insectile carapace is hard to destroy, and they can move quite fast and are also known to spit their liquids over a great distance.

Some spitbugs have specialized in living in canals under bigger cities where they consume sexual sanitary products.
